data.text: @FrequentFlyer80 Hi there, thanks for the tweet. Are you able to DM us more information on what went wrong on your flight BL 244 so we can further look into this for you. Regards - Joie
@jasovinz Thanks for tagging us. You may now send us the details of your concern via DM. Thanks - Jerry

data.text: @BGsiregar Hi there. I'm sorry to hear if your flight the next day was delayed. While we try to avoid delays to our flights, they are unavoidable at times due to operational and strict safety standards. I apologise for any inconvenience caused. Thanks - H

@Alyvds Hi Alison, thanks for the tweet. I understand that you're having difficulties retrieving your boarding pass. May I please ask if you could send us a DM along with your booking reference and full name. We'll see how we can assist further. Regards - Yen

@JohnTilburg1 Hi John, thanks for your reply. We would appreciate if you can send us your details via DM and I'd suggest to delete you tweet as we don't recommend posting your details on a public platform. Regards - Yen

@weareArvis Hi Arvis, an IT issue affected our airport systems this morning resulting in multiple flights experiencing delays. However, our technicians have worked on the issue and all our systems are now back up and running, and flights operating normally. -Camille

@JohnTilburg1 Hi John, customers can download a PDF boarding pass via Manage Booking or Web check-in once they've checked in on-line. Could you send us your booking reference number and full name so we can further check this? -Camille
@JoshDavies_01 Hi Josh, thanks for your reply. It may help to know that we have different types of fares. So we can review this for you, kindly DM us your details. Regards - Yen

@JoshDavies_01 Hi Josh, thanks for the tweet. I understand that you would like to cancel and refund your flight. So I could look into this for you, kindly DM us your booking reference and full name. Regards - Yen

@hv2008 Hi Himanshu, thanks for your response. I hope you can appreciate that we're unable to send DMs. But if you'll initiate to send us a DM, we'll be able to look into this further for you. Regards - Yen

@hv2008 Hi Himanshu, thanks for your reply. As you may appreciate, we don't recommend posting this for security purposes. If you could please DM us, we'll be able to look into this for you. Regards - Yen

@hv2008 Hi Himanshu, thanks for the tweet. You may appreciate to know that we do not recommend posting your booking details online, you may want to delete your tweet and kindly DM us your booking reference so we can further assist. Regards – Joie
@SeptaMaidi Hi there. I can't give any guarantee if you will be able to speak with a Bahasa speaking agent.  Thanks - Hazel

data.text: @SeptaMaidi Hi there. Our contact number from Indonesia are the following: +62 803 852 9779 charges apply, in English, Monday to Sunday, 24 hours, using an Indonesian (local) SIM card and 001 803 852 9779. Thanks - H
@Aparajeta Hi Aparajeta, thanks for the tweet. Please know that I've responded to your DM. Regards - Yen

@petrieb Hi Bill, thanks for your tweet. I'm concerned to hear about the check-in experience that you had in Singapore. Please DM us your booking reference along with your full name so I can look into this further. Regards – Franz
@ettapi Hi there, thanks for your tweet. We've already responded to your DM. Please check your inbox. Regards – Franz

@ooffwmin Hi there, As advised, any changes on the name from married to maiden, you will not incur any charges. I also see that you are seeking to void your flight. Kindly DM us your booking reference so we can further assist with your concerns. Regards - Joie
@ooffwmin Hi there. You will need to settle your booking first before we can make the changes, otherwise you may book a new flight with the correct name. Thanks - H

@ooffwmin Hi there. You can pay your flights via Manage Booking online. Please see here: https://t.co/xweA4PnaBr and once confirmed, you may contact us again so we can make the changes for you. Thanks - H
@ooffwmin Hi Hyeon. For any changes on the name from married to maiden, you will not incur any charges. You will just have to provide us the copy of passport as reference. Thanks - H

data.text:
RT @lloydthelostboy: Sakura season is fast approaching in Japan, but where to find these lovely cherry blossoms in Osaka and Kyoto? 🌸

Flew…
@ma_gleny Hi Ma. Gleny, thanks for the tweet. So I could assist you further, kindly DM us your booking reference and full name. Regards - Yen

@telalou Hi Kristle, thanks for the tweet and I'm glad to hear that you got your Jetstar voucher. We go to great lengths to try and provide passengers with excellent customer service so it’s always helpful when a customer takes the time to tell us exactly what we’re getting right. - Joie
@nhiinaa Hi Nina, thanks for tagging us. Glad that we're able to assist you with your concern. See you on-board soon. :) Regards - Yen

data.text: RT @Darwinairport: It was sure worth the early wake up to see this unique Jetstar Asia 'flying billboard' arrive in Darwin for the first ti…
@iheartjeep Hi Vanessa, thanks for the tweet. I recognise that you were disappointed. May I please ask for more details of what has gone wrong via DM so I could assist you further? Regards - Yen
@diandranigya Hi Diandra, thanks for the tweet. I understand that you'd like to reschedule your flight. To assist you  further, kindly DM us your booking reference and full name. Regards - Yen
@k7flies Hi there, thanks for the tweet. If you could please DM us your booking reference and full name so we could check this for you. Regards - Yen
@dilleuh Hi Dilla, thanks for the tweet. Could you please provide us more information along with your booking reference and full name via DM so we could assist? Regards - Yen
@drewsey87 Thanks for responding, Andrew. If you'll send us a DM, we'll be able to check this for you and discuss further. Regards - Yen

@drewsey87 Hi Andrew, thanks for the tweet and I understand that you are enquiring regarding your flight from Singapore. Kindly DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can check this for you. Regards - Joie

data.text: @virtualaris Hi Aris, thanks for the tweet. Qantas Club members whose next onward flight that day is a Jetstar operated flight with a JQ or 3K flight number will gain complimentary access to the Qantas Club, where available. Please check here: https://t.co/946r3kp0Hk for more details. - Joie

urls.title: Cheap Flights | Jetstar
urls.description: Famous low airfares. Great destinations. Discover our domestic and international network across Australia, New Zealand, Asia and the Pacific.

data.text: @lloydthelostboy 2/2 for bookings made from https://t.co/GWv1xQkLT3 in the Philippines. If you’d like to book a flight within the next 14 days you’ll need to use another payment option. Please check our website https://t.co/0rnVEAlOiJ for more information. Regards - Joie

@lloydthelostboy 1/2 Hi Lloyd, thanks for the tweet and I understand that you are enquiring GCash as payment option for your Manila to Singapore booking. It may help to know that this mode of payment is only available for bookings up to 14 days prior to departure –

@CunningQuestion Hi Andrew, thanks for getting back to us. Glad that our crew were able to give Leonard a birthday present and that he was able to enjoy his flight with us. Hoping to see you on-board again soon. :) Regards - Yen
@CunningQuestion Hi Andrew, thanks for tagging us. We hope that Harry will enjoy his flight with us to Phuket! :) Regards - Yen
@CunningQuestion 2/2  Wishing Leonard a happy birthday today. Hope you enjoy your flight. :) Regards - Yen

@CunningQuestion 1/2 Hi Andrew, thanks for the tweet. We would really love to assist however, it would be a great idea if you'll discuss this with your flight's cabin crew as they may have a better idea of when they can fit the announcement into their schedules.

@BudheEci Hi Yesi, thanks for the tweet. I understand that you are requesting a wheelchair for your Mom's flight to Singapore tonight. Kindly DM us your Mom's booking reference along with your full name so we can further check this for you. Regards - Joie

data.text: @camel_113 Hi Adrien, thanks for your tweet. I understand that you want to know if you can check your baggage in 12 hours prior to your flight to Osaka. It may help to know that check-in and bag drop opens 3 hours before departure. Please see here: https://t.co/pOCddRwG7W Thanks - Franz
@RahadiatnoPutro Hi Rahadiatno, we have unblocked you on this account and have responded to your DM on our Jetstar Airways account. -Camille
@rohit_dey Hi Rohit, sorry to hear about your damaged and lost baggage. May I please ask if you could DM us your booking reference and full name so we could assist you further? Regards - Yen
@feliccine Hi Felicia. I can understand your frustration about the delay of your flight. If you can provide us your booking reference via DM so we can look into this for you. Thanks - H

@vinamelody 2/2 I suggest clearing the cache and cookies or try using a difference browser or device. You may also want to disable your pop ad blockers and book using incognito or safe mode on your browser. Please let me know how you go. Regards – Joie

@vinamelody 1/2 Hi Vina, thanks for the tweet. I’m sorry to hear that you are having difficulties booking on our website. I have checked this for you and as of this writing, I can see that we don’t have any website outages on our end.

@WinkySolutions Hi there, thanks for the tweet. Sorry to hear that you've been disappointed with the service provided by our staff. Could you please provide us more information of what has gone wrong via DM so I could look into this further? Regards - Yen
@Timothe_Slr Hi Timothe, thanks for tagging us. May I please ask if you could DM us your booking reference and full name so we could check this for you. Regards - Yen

@R0b_H3r 2/2 I suggest clearing the cache and cookies or try using a difference browser or device. You may also want to disable your pop ad blockers and book using incognito or safe mode on your browser. Please let me know how you go. Regards - Joie

@R0b_H3r 1/2 Hi Heryanti, thanks for the tweet. I’m sorry to hear that you are having difficulties booking on our website. I have checked this for you and as of this writing, I can see that we don’t have any website outages on our end.

data.text: @kami_samansa Hi there, thanks for the tweet and I'm sorry to hear about the delayed flight. Kindly DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can check this for you. Regards - Joie
@TerjeBrthen The social media team are only able to respond to messages in English. Are you able to repost in English so we can assist? -Camille
@NavelLintCorp Hi There, I’ve responded to your other Tweet. –M

@NavelLintCorp Thanks for your Tweet. I recognise its upsetting when your bags were lost. I also understand that the baggage price difference. Could you please DM (direct message) your booking reference and full name so I can check this further and see how I can assist? –M

@AndyJRyanPhoto Hi Andy, thanks for the tweet and I understand that you have an enquiry regarding your baggage transfer. Kindly DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can look into this. Regards - Joie

@andryramana Glad to hear about the amazing service you received from our airport staff. It’s so rewarding for our team to have their work recognised in such a thoughtful way. I’ve passed on your feedback to our staff and their managers. I know they will really appreciate it. :) –M
@Sasjordan88 Hi Alex, thanks for the tweet. If you could please DM us your booking reference and full name so we could check this for you? Regards - Yen
@MannatJuneja Hi Mannat, thanks for the tweet. Please know that I've responded to your DM. Regards - Yen
@anu71 2/2 Kindly DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can further assist with your request. Regards - Joie

@anu71 1/2 Hi Annie, thanks for the tweet. I understand that you are requesting a wheelchair for your mother on your booking. Please know that we don't advise passengers to post personal details including your booking reference publicly.
@LucMandret Hi Luc, thanks for your tweet. We'd like to look into this further, may I please ask if you could DM us your booking reference and full name? Hope to hear from you. Regards - Yen

@philiplgs Hi Philip, thanks for the response. I'd like to apologise for the inconvenience this may have caused you. Still, I'm glad that it's now successful. Please be assured that your feedback will be used for the improvement of our website. Regards - Yen
@MsGurpreet_gmis Hi Grupreet, thanks for the tweet. Just letting you know that I've responded to your DM. Regards - Yen

@famnish Hi Fam, thanks for responding. May I please ask if you could DM us your booking reference and full name so we could assist you further with your concern? Looking forward to hear from you. Regards - Yen

urls.title: Contact numbers | Jetstar
urls.description: Hello! The quickest and easiest way to make changes to your booking is at Manage booking. If you can’ t find what you’ re looking for, please give us a call on one of the numbers listed below. 131 538 charges apply, Monday to Sunday 4001 201 260 charges apply, Monday to Sunday in English, Monday to Friday, 9.00am to 6.00pm (local time) in Mandarin and Cantonese +613 9645 5999 charges apply, Monday to Sunday in English, Monday to Friday, 9.00am to 6.00pm (local time) in Mandarin and Cantonese +852 3192

data.text: @famnish Hi Fam, thanks for the tweet. I understand that you are enquiring the contact number in Jakarta. You may also want to try +62 803 852 9779. Please check our website here: https://t.co/hxkMGwA4BQ for the list of contact numbers. Regards - Joie

@philiplgs 2/2 I suggest clearing the cache and cookies or try using a difference browser or device. You may also want to disable your pop ad blockers and book using incognito or safe mode on your browser. Regards - Joie

@philiplgs 1/2 Hi Philip, thanks for the tweet and I’m sorry to hear that you are having difficulties paying for you booking on our website. I have checked this for you and as of this writing, I can confirm that there are no payment outages on our end.

@rahulrajmalik Hi there. Before every departure, our cabin crew tidy the aircraft and ad-hoc cleaning is performed as required. Our aircraft are deep cleaned at the end of every service day. I can appreciate your disappointment that you found the aircraft to be untidy. My apologies. Thanks - H
@Nikky_Cho Hi Ananda, thanks for the tweet. You may wish to contact them directly here: groups@jetstar.com. Hope this helps. Regards - Yen
@DesiPuspandini Hi Desi, thanks for the reply. Yes, you can DM us the details so we can further assist with your concerns. Regards - Joie

@DesiPuspandini Hi Desi, thanks for the tweet. I understand that you need assistance with updating your passport details to your booking. To assist you further, may I please ask to DM us your booking reference and full name? Regards - Yen
@fortunate_event Hi there, thanks for the tweet. Please know that I've responded to your DM. Regards - Yen
@twtenleuleu Thanks for your tweet. It may help to know that we're only able to respond in English. So we can assist further, please re-send your query in English. Thanks, Franz

@DanlEskin Hi Danny. I'm sorry to hear about the service provided by our staff at Bali airport. Could you provide us your booking reference along with your full name via DM so we can check this for you? Thanks - H

@happygopami 2/2 Unfortunately, although, we aim to answer every call promptly, delays can still occur. Kindly provide us further details along with your booking reference and full name via DM so we can further assist. Regards - Joie

@happygopami 1/2 Hi there, thanks for the tweet and I understand that you are having difficulties reaching our telephone reservations team. We consistently monitor our staff levels at peak periods and are training new staff to cut down on waiting times.
@mrbrown Hi @mrbrown you definitely need to check out Okinawa, where we fly 4x weekly from Singapore! Here's the secret to their longevity! https://t.co/r9QsbhCMQw
@theflutemaster Hi there. Could you provide your booking reference number via DM along with your email address so we can check this for you? Thanks - H

data.text: @theflutemaster Hi Jeffrey. Thanks for the shout out. I'm glad that you enjoyed travelling with us. We look forward to welcoming you on board Jetstar flight soon. Thanks - H
@Blububle Hi Edwin, thanks for the tweet. I understand that you need assistance regarding your booking. So we could further assist, kindly DM us your booking reference and full name. Regards - Yen
@DanCasey96 Hi Dan, please send us your full name and booking reference number in a DM so we can further assist. -Camille
@ManingCMaribao Hi Maning, thanks for your reply. I've responded to your DM. Regards - Yen

@ManingCMaribao Hi Maning, I understand how frustrating it is when your flight to Chitose was cancelled. We'd like to look into this further for you. Kindly DM us your booking reference and full name so we could assist. Regards - Yen
Jetstar Asia extends priority boarding to customers seated at rows 2 to 5 from today. Upfront seating is available from SGD9. https://t.co/6pJmgWICaA https://t.co/1JOvukopqN

@vhiily Hi Villyana, thanks for the tweet. I see that you need assistance with changing the title for one of the passengers in the booking. Kindly DM us your booking reference along with your full name so I can further assist. Regards - Joie
@lifewithgladys Hi Gladys, thanks for the tweet. Could you DM us more information so we can assist you further regarding your concerns. Regards - Joie

@KaryaToko Hi Toko, Thanks for the tweet and I understand that you haven't received your itinerary with us. Kindly DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can assist. Regards - Joie

@iCeejay Thanks for your Tweet. After you’ve made your booking you can purchase checked allowance or increase your allowance at any time via our Manage Booking page, up until before check-in opens for your flight. See https://t.co/YHXdiEO2Kb for more details. –M

@byputri_ Hi Putri, I understand you need assistance in changing the destination of your booking. Changing the origin or destination will depend on the type of ticket you have purchased. Please send us a DM of your full name and booking reference number so we can check this. -Camille
@defur_ Hi there, thanks for the tweet. We’d like to look into this matter further. Kindly DM us your booking reference and full name. Regards - Yen
@HannahIPower Hi Hannah, thanks for the tweet. So we could assist you further, kindly DM us your booking reference and full name. Regards - Yen

@RoriPie Hi Roberta, thanks for the tweet. I'm sorry to hear if you've been disappointed. We'd like to check this for you. Kindly DM us more information of your concern along with your booking reference and full name. Regards - Yen
@Saidi21ns Hi Saidi, thanks for the tweet. Just letting you know that I've responded to your DM. Regards - Yen

@IsMeSW Hi there, thanks for the tweet. It may help to know that powerbanks with 100Wh or less are allowed to be carried on-board but are still subject for screening at the airport security. Please refer to this link: https://t.co/5Z3YANqied. Regards – Joie
@jpesquejo Hi there, thanks for the tweet and for considering us as one of your preferred airline. See you on-board on soon! Regards - Yen

data.text: @iCeejay Hi there. When travelling on a Starter Fare you can carry one piece of baggage up to 56cm x 36cm x 23cm per person and one small item such as a laptop, purse or handbag. The total weight of all your cabin baggage mustn’t exceed 7 kilos. Please see here:https://t.co/V06mtl6D4l - H
@alexander_hagen Hi Alexander, thanks for the tweet. So we could further look into this, kindly DM us your booking reference and full name. Regards - Yen
